export var config={headers:{Authorization:"Bearer "+localStorage.getItem("jwt")}};/**

export var CREATE_POST_URL="http://localhost:5000/createpost";// Home Screen
export var ALL_POST_URL="http://localhost:5000/allpost";// Login Screen
export var LOGIN_URL="http://localhost:5000/signin";// NewPassword Screen
export var NEW_PWD_URL="http://localhost:5000/new-pwd";// Profile Screen
